form_data.Overall Account Plant Health: Good - Plants healthy, minor maintenance needed
form_data.Service Notes & Details: Good visit overall. Most plants are thriving. However several plants need to be swapped out — they've been declining slowly and are past the point of recovery. Logged replacements below.
form_data.List Replacements Needed: 6 inch pothos in the lobby reception desk is completely dead — soil bone dry and stems gone mushy. 10 inch bird of paradise in the main conference room has broken its main stem — too damaged to recover, needs a full replacement. 4 inch ZZ plant on the windowsill in office 214 has yellowed out entirely. About 3 of the small succulent arrangements near the elevator lobby need refreshing — dried out past saving.
